name: Pesadelo O inicio
description:
Pesadelo is a brazilian horror game released in 2013.
You will experience Alex's nightmare, a young worker atormented by stories and urban legends about his next work place. Suspense is waiting for you! Run and pray to wake up!

A lot of youtubers has been played this game and we appreciate that.
PewDiePie, Markiplier, Yamimash, Zangado,ElectronicDesireGE and others.

Thank you for all support

Check out The second game of series

https://skyjazgames.itch.io/pesadelo-regression
